about

Online Communication & Marketing, all-web-things enthusiast student in his early 20’s. Currently in third and final year of a professional bachelor’s degree. Extremely curious about the web technically (new HTML & CSS features, beautiful design, JS/ jQuery, interactive SVG’s), and contextually (impact of the internet on society and values). Spreadsheet & data visualization freak. Coffee addict. Seriously, ask @Cleverwood.
